_header: Thou shalt love God with heart entire
Note: For an introductory couplet in some MSS see 2511; for two MSS which use a completely different version see 5843. For still another version occurring separately with a unique stanza prefixed, etc., see 1768.
_description: The Ten Commandments — ten quatrains; usually occurring in the Speculum Christiani (Secunda Tabula), sometimes occurring separately

BLHar206.First Lines:
Thoue schat loue gode with hert entereWith all þi
                        saull and þi myght…
BLHar206.Last Lines:
…Bot kye ally well godes byddyngAnd
                    cristen faith leue stedfastly
BLHar206.Note:
Passim, with one stanza on each leaf, recto and verso; ‘u’
                    of ‘saull’ in line 2 added above the line (f. 21v);
                    ‘ay’ of penultimate line originally written ‘all’ and
                    corrected by scribe by subpunction and adding ‘y’ above the line (f.
                    25).
